recipe.ingredients: - chickpeas (cooked and drained): 1 can (15 ounces) - cucumber (diced): 1 medium - cherry tomatoes (halved): 1 cup - red onion (finely chopped): 1 small - kalamata olives (halved): 1/2 cup - feta cheese (crumbled): 1/2 cup - parsley (chopped): 1/4 cup - lemon juice: 1/4 cup - olive oil: 3 tablespoons - garlic (minced): 1 clove - dried oregano: 1 teaspoon - salt: 1/4 teaspoon - black pepper: 1/8 teaspoon
recipe.directions: 1. Prepare Chickpeas: If using canned chickpeas, rinse them under cold water to remove excess salt and reduce the sodium content. 2. Combine Salad Ingredients: In a large bowl, mix the chickpeas, cucumber, cherry tomatoes, red onion, kalamata olives, feta cheese, and chopped parsley. 3. Make Dressing: In a small bowl, whisk together lemon juice, olive oil, minced garlic, dried oregano, salt, and black pepper. 4. Dress the Salad: Pour the dressing over the salad ingredients and toss gently to coat everything evenly. 5. Let it Marinate: Allow the salad to sit for about 10 minutes to let the flavors blend together before serving.
